name: Defend of Constructia
description:
Defend against Orcs!

Movement:

W - Jump

A - Left

D - Right

Blocks :

1 - Small Block (1 Coin)

2 - Medium Block (3 Coin)

3 - Large Block (5 Coin)

4- Auto Archer (5 Coin)

5 - Spikes (2 Coin)

6 - Glue (3 Coin)

7 - Bomb (7 Coin)

8 - Door (3 Coin)

9 - Switch (1 Coin)

0 - Snowman Decoy (? Coin)

P - Killing Cylinder (15 Coin)

I - Bulid Mode:

lpm - create

rpm - change color (red switch-red bomb, blue switch - blue bomb ...)

O - Destroy Mode :

rpm - destroy
